channel.title: CVE Feed for causefx -- causefx/organizr
channel.description: The latest CVEs for causefx -- causefx/organizr

item.title: CVE-2022-1909|2024-08-03T00:17:00.876Z -- causefx -- causefx%2Forganizr
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - Stored in GitHub repository causefx/organizr prior to 2.1.2200.

item.title: CVE-2022-1699|2024-08-03T00:10:03.941Z -- causefx -- causefx%2Forganizr
item.description: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption in GitHub repository causefx/organizr prior to 2.1.2000. This vulnerability can be abused by doing a DDoS attack for which genuine users will not able to access resources/applications.

item.title: CVE-2022-1698|2024-08-03T00:10:03.934Z -- causefx -- causefx%2Forganizr
item.description: Allowing long password leads to denial of service in GitHub repository causefx/organizr prior to 2.1.2000. This vulnerability can be abused by doing a DDoS attack for which genuine users will not able to access resources/applications.
